full_summary:
================
### Request for Proposal: Ground Keeping and Snow Removal at NRC Royalmount Building

#### Summary

The objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to provide a contractor with operational service requirements for ground maintenance, snow and ice control, and waste operations for the National Research Council Canada's Royalmount Building.

#### Details

* Request Number: PW-22-01010425
* Solicitation Number: 22-58066
* Publication Date: 2022-10-18
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-11T14:00:00 (Closed)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Service Requirements

The contractor must provide ground maintenance, snow and ice control, and waste operations services for the Royalmount Building. The contractor is responsible for providing all operational services on all lands/campuses within the scope of this contract at their own cost. The contractor will be responsible for any rehabilitation, damages or replacement costs resulting from their absence or lack of service and maintenance.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Please refer to the mandatory evaluation criteria document for detailed information. Key evaluation criteria include:

* Capability and capacity to deliver the required services
* Past experience and qualifications
* Financial proposal and basis of payment

#### Award Criteria

The award will be based on the evaluation of the proposals received. The Government of Canada reserves the right to award a contract without further competition if an acceptable proposal is received.

#### Procedure

Tender bids should be submitted electronically through the Canadabuys procurement portal. Please refer to the complete terms and conditions and the Request for Proposal document for additional information.

#### Important Documents

The following documents are available for download from the Canadabuys procurement portal:

* Mandatory evaluation criteria
* Contractor designation
* Contractor equipment listing
* Security requirements check list

Please note that this RFP has closed and no further bids will be accepted. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Stephane Lajoie at stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca.
